Coverage: Flattops Wilderness Area well and can even be worked from the Front Range in some locations. Coverage at the east end of Glenwood Canyon to Eagle is available in some spots along I-70.  Map
Links: Full-time to the  Colorado Connection System .
Notes: Part of the Colorado Connection system of Repeaters
Nets:
Colorado Traffic Net: Daily at 19:30. 
Colorado Connection Net (all welcome): Thu at 20:00. 
Statewide ARES: Sun at 20:00.
